subject: fix(ci): add package-lock.json for reproducible CI builds
body:
The deploy workflow uses actions/setup-node@v4 with cache: npm and
npm ci, both of which require a lock file. Without package-lock.json
the cache step warns and npm ci fails entirely.

Tags: ci, dependencies, devops
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 3
Impact: infrastructure
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: ci-deploy
Semver: patch

title: add package-lock.json for reproducible CI builds
